channel.title: CVE Feed for mihail-barinov -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for mihail-barinov -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-8363|2024-09-05T19:51:37.355Z -- mihail-barinov -- share%20this%20image
item.description: The Share This Image plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's STI Buttons shortcode in all versions up to, and including, 2.02 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-8108|2024-09-03T14:22:11.531Z -- mihail-barinov -- share%20this%20image
item.description: The Share This Image plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the 'alignment' parameter in all versions up to, and including, 2.01 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
